title: RRB ALP CBT 2 revised schedule announced, know which candidates need to appear
story_summary: Railway Recruitment Boards (RRBs) have revised the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) CBT 2 schedule. Originally slated for March 19-20, the exam will now be held on May 2 and 6. Candidates can access exam city information 10 days prior and admit cards four days before. The CBT 2 exam lasts 2.5 hours and includes 175 questions across two parts. It will be conducted in multiple languages and includes negative marking. RRBs aim to fill 5696 ALP vacancies through this recruitment.

title: JKSSB JE recruitment 2025: Registration for 292 posts ends on April 7
story_summary: The registration for JKSSB JE recruitment 2025, offering 292 Junior Engineer posts, closes on April 7, 2025.  The Jammu and Kashmir Services Selection Board (JKSSB) is conducting the recruitment. The selection process involves a written examination comprising objective-type, multiple-choice questions in English. There is negative marking of one-fourth for incorrect answers. Shortlisted candidates will undergo document verification. The application fee is ₹600, with a reduced fee of ₹500 for reserved categories.

title: SECR Apprentice Recruitment 2025: Apply for 1007 posts, check details here
story_summary: South East Central Railway (SECR) has announced apprentice recruitment for 1007 posts. The application process started on April 5 and concludes on May 4, 2025.  Vacancies are available in Nagpur Division (919) and Workshop Motibagh (88). Applicants should have passed matriculation with 50% marks. The age limit is 15-24 years. Selection is based on a merit list combining matriculation percentage and ITI marks.

title: IDBI Bank SCO Recruitment 2025: Notification out for 119 posts, details here
story_summary: IDBI Bank has released a notification for Specialist Cadre Officer (SCO) recruitment, offering 119 posts. Registration begins on April 7 and ends on April 20, 2025.  Vacancies include Deputy General Manager (8), Assistant General Manager (42), and Manager (69).  The selection process involves preliminary screening of eligibility criteria followed by Group Discussion and/or Personal Interview. The application fee is ₹1050 for General/EWS/OBC and ₹250 for SC/ST.

title: TNUSRB SI Recruitment 2025: Notification out for 1299 posts, check here
story_summary: Tamil Nadu Uniformed Services Recruitment Board (TNUSRB) has announced SI recruitment for 1299 posts. Registration starts on April 7 and concludes on May 3, 2025. Available positions include Sub-Inspectors of Police (Taluk - 933) and (AR - 366).  Applicants need a Bachelor’s Degree from a UGC-recognized university. The age limit is 20-30 years as of July 1, 2025. The selection process includes a Tamil Language Eligibility Test, main written exam, physical efficiency test, and viva-voce.

title: Where to check RRB NTPC exam dates when announced | Live Updates
story_summary: This article provides live updates on the announcement of RRB NTPC exam dates. Candidates can download the schedule and admit card from rrbcdg.gov.in. Check the website for the latest information.

title: CISF Constable Recruitment 2025: Last date tomorrow to apply for 1161 posts
story_summary: The registration for CISF Constable Recruitment 2025, offering 1161 posts, closes on April 3, 2025.  Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) aims to fill constable/tradesmen positions. Applicants need matriculation or equivalent for skilled trades. The age limit is 18-23 years as of August 1, 2025. An application fee of ₹100 is charged for unreserved, OBC, and EWS categories, with exemptions for female, SC/ST, and ex-servicemen candidates.

title: People with autistic disorders are entitled to get gainful employment: Experts
story_summary: Experts emphasize providing skill training and empathy for individuals with autistic disorders to secure gainful employment. Neurodiversity is prevalent, with autism affecting 1 in 100 children globally. Focus should be on skill-building in sensory-friendly environments. Organizations should foster inclusive, autism-friendly workspaces. Vocational skill training is crucial for employment. Deepranjani Foundation offers training in multimedia, bakery, spice making, handicrafts, and tailoring, providing employment opportunities.

title: SBI Clerk Mains Admit Card 2025 out, download via direct link
story_summary: State Bank of India (SBI) released the admit card for the Junior Associates mains exam 2025 on April 1, 2025. Candidates can download hall tickets from sbi.co.in/web/careers using their Registration Number and Password. The SBI Junior Associate Mains Exam 2025 is scheduled for April 10 and April 12, 2025. The exam is 2 hours and 40 minutes long, with 190 questions totaling 200 marks across four sections.

title: TNPSC Group 1 Exam 2025: Registration for CCSE I and IA begins at tnpsc.gov.in
story_summary: Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission (TNPSC) started registration for the Group 1 Exam 2025 on April 1, 2025.  Applications are to be submitted online through www.tnpscexams.in. The last date to apply is April 30, 2025.  The prelims exam is scheduled for June 15, 2025. The selection process includes a preliminary exam, main exam, and interview. The preliminary exam serves as a screening test.
